name: Narwhal felt taxidermy
description:
Narwhals, narwhals swimming in the ocean..

This is a stuffed felt narwhal that has been mounted on a painted and sealed wood plaque. It is hand made and is an original SquackDoodle速 design. 

This little guy would make:
a great gift, 
for fun decor in a nursery, child's room, playroom, office, or living room, or
a cute Halloween decoration!

The plaque measures approximately 8 x 11 inches and is ready to hang with a sawtooth hanger attached to the back.

Please feel free to convo us if you have any questions or would like to make a custom order.

Because each of these critters is made to order, please allow up to 2 weeks for production time.

Thanks for looking!

name: Moose felt taxidermy
description:
This is a stuffed felt moose mounted on a wood plaque. He is an original design by SquackDoodle. You may choose your own fabrics and colors by leaving us a note at the time of purchase or by contacting us directly. We love creating OOAK pieces so get creative!

This little guy would make a great gift or fun decor in a nursery, child's room, playroom, office, or living room!

The plaque measures approximately 8x10 inches and comes ready to hang with a sawtooth hanger attached to the back.

Please feel free to convo us if you have any questions or would like to make a custom order and please allow up to two weeks for processing.

Thanks so much!!

name: Honey Badger mug
description:
This is a 16 oz white upcycled stoneware coffee mug featuring an image of the honey badger. But honey badger don't care about that!

Please hand wash your mug in hot water with a soft sponge. Abrasives can scratch the image. Please do not place in dishwasher. We use heat and pressure to apply the decals so it's only fitting that heat and pressure in the dishwasher can also help remove them.

Please feel free to drop us a line if you have any questions or if you would like to make a custom request. 

Thanks so much for looking!
